channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Analog Photography: The Beginner’s Guide to Film Cameras (2025)
item.description: Which film camera should you get? Which films are the best? We demystify the world of analog photography to help you get started.

item.title: 11 Best Natural Deodorants I Tested for Daily Use (2025)
item.description: Want to go aluminum-free without being stinky? Native is our top pick as the best natural deodorant. Read our full thoughts on all the items we tested...

item.title: The Best TVs We’ve Reviewed in 2025: Sony, Samsung, LG, and More
item.description: From LEDs to fancy OLED models, in 4K and beyond, these are our favorite televisions at every price.

item.title: 5 Best Lip Balms to Try in 2025, All Tested in Tough Conditions
item.description: If your lip balm makes you need more lip balm, try our top picks instead.

item.title: JPMorgan doesn’t want to pay Frank founder Charlie Javice’s legal bills
item.description: A lawyer representing JPMorgan said Javice’s legal team billed for expenses including luxury hotel upgrades, 24 hours of work in a single day, and cel...

item.title: Disney and YouTube TV reach deal to end blackout
item.description: You can watch "Jeopardy!" on YouTube TV again.

item.title: 17 Best Gifts for PC Gamers (2025): Headsets, Desks, Monitors
item.description: It’s dangerous to go alone! Take these headsets, keyboards, and mice and give them to your favorite PC gamer.

item.title: Jury says Apple owes Masimo $634M for patent infringement
item.description: A federal jury in California ruled Friday that Apple must pay medical device maker Masimo $634 million for infringing a patent on blood oxygen monitor...

item.title: Leaked documents shed light into how much OpenAI pays Microsoft
item.description: Leaked documents reveal how much OpenAI paid Microsoft under a revenue-share agreement. They also indicate inference costs.

item.title: Databricks co-founder argues US must go open source to beat China in AI
item.description: VC Andy Konwinski argues that the U.S. is losing its AI research dominance to China.
